name: Cannot set a "Description" in a project with more than the maximum characters [140]

steps.name: Given I set up a "PUT" request to "/projects/{proj_id}" endpoint
And I set up the data
Then I get a "400" status code as response

And I verify the general_problem of error is: "This extended_string is too long:  'extended string[140] in the request body. - A description of the project's content. Entered through the web UI on the Project Settings page. '"

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Functional Test Negative Cases of Update Projects
